category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_display_participants
preference.preference_description: Decides which participant types will be shown while assigning dynamic participants for an object. Valid Values: * allowable: Show all the dynamic participant types associated with the target object type. This is the default value. * assignable: Show all the dynamic participant types which are assignable by the current user and used in any of the in-progress workflows on the target object. If there is no in-progress workflow; all the assignable dynamic participant types will be shown.
